Package org.radarbase.management.web.rest

Class SourceTypeResource

java.lang.Object
org.radarbase.management.web.rest.SourceTypeResource
@RestController @RequestMapping("/api") public class SourceTypeResource extends Object
REST controller for managing SourceType.

  • Method Details

    • createSourceType

      @PostMapping("/source-types") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<SourceTypeDTO> createSourceType(@Valid @RequestBody @Valid SourceTypeDTO sourceTypeDto) throws URISyntaxException, org.radarbase.auth.exception.NotAuthorizedException
      POST /source-types : Create a new sourceType.
      Parameters:
      sourceTypeDto - the sourceTypeDto to create
      Returns:
      the ResponseEntity with status 201 (Created) and with body the new sourceTypeDto, or with status 400 (Bad Request) if the sourceType has already an ID
      Throws:
      URISyntaxException - if the Location URI syntax is incorrect
      org.radarbase.auth.exception.NotAuthorizedException

    • updateSourceType

      @PutMapping("/source-types") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<SourceTypeDTO> updateSourceType(@Valid @RequestBody @Valid SourceTypeDTO sourceTypeDto) throws URISyntaxException, org.radarbase.auth.exception.NotAuthorizedException
      PUT /source-types : Updates an existing sourceType.
      Parameters:
      sourceTypeDto - the sourceTypeDto to update
      Returns:
      the ResponseEntity with status 200 (OK) and with body the updated sourceTypeDto, or with status 400 (Bad Request) if the sourceTypeDto is not valid, or with status 500 (Internal Server Error) if the sourceTypeDto couldnt be updated
      Throws:
      URISyntaxException - if the Location URI syntax is incorrect
      org.radarbase.auth.exception.NotAuthorizedException

    • getAllSourceTypes

      @GetMapping("/source-types") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<SourceTypeDTO>> getAllSourceTypes(@PageableDefault(page=0,size=2147483647) org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable) throws org.radarbase.auth.exception.NotAuthorizedException
      GET /source-types : get all the sourceTypes.
      Parameters:
      pageable - parameters
      Returns:
      the ResponseEntity with status 200 (OK) and the list of sourceTypes in body
      Throws:
      org.radarbase.auth.exception.NotAuthorizedException

    • getSourceTypes

      @GetMapping("/source-types/{producer:^[_\'.@A-Za-z0-9- ]*$}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<SourceTypeDTO>> getSourceTypes(@PathVariable String producer) throws org.radarbase.auth.exception.NotAuthorizedException
      Find the list of SourceTypes made by the given producer.
      Parameters:
      producer - The producer
      Returns:
      A list of objects matching the producer
      Throws:
      org.radarbase.auth.exception.NotAuthorizedException

    • getSourceTypes

      @GetMapping("/source-types/{producer:^[_\'.@A-Za-z0-9- ]*$}/{model:^[_\'.@A-Za-z0-9- ]*$}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<SourceTypeDTO>> getSourceTypes(@PathVariable String producer, @PathVariable String model) throws org.radarbase.auth.exception.NotAuthorizedException
      Find the list of SourceTypes of the given producer and model. Can be multiple since multiple version of a single model can be made.
      Parameters:
      producer - The producer
      model - The model
      Returns:
      A list of objects matching the producer and model
      Throws:
      org.radarbase.auth.exception.NotAuthorizedException

    • getSourceTypes

      @GetMapping("/source-types/{producer:^[_\'.@A-Za-z0-9- ]*$}/{model:^[_\'.@A-Za-z0-9- ]*$}/{version:^[_\'.@A-Za-z0-9- ]*$}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<SourceTypeDTO> getSourceTypes(@PathVariable String producer, @PathVariable String model, @PathVariable String version) throws org.radarbase.auth.exception.NotAuthorizedException
      Find the SourceType of the given producer, model and version.
      Parameters:
      producer - The producer
      model - The model
      version - The version
      Returns:
      A single SourceType object matching the producer, model and version
      Throws:
      org.radarbase.auth.exception.NotAuthorizedException

    • deleteSourceType

      @DeleteMapping("/source-types/{producer:^[_\'.@A-Za-z0-9- ]*$}/{model:^[_\'.@A-Za-z0-9- ]*$}/{version:^[_\'.@A-Za-z0-9- ]*$}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Void> deleteSourceType(@PathVariable String producer, @PathVariable String model, @PathVariable String version) throws org.radarbase.auth.exception.NotAuthorizedException
      DELETE /source-types/:producer/:model/:version : delete the sourceType with the specified producer, model and version.
      Parameters:
      producer - The producer
      model - The model
      version - The version
      Returns:
      the ResponseEntity with status 200 (OK)
      Throws:
      org.radarbase.auth.exception.NotAuthorizedException
